title: I want harder punishment for people losing ranked game on purpose please
body:
Players keep pissing others off ruining experience of competitive players who try to climb the ranked ladder.
Since they don't  care at all of ranking, i wonder if could there be a hard punishment for such a subject like not being able to play ranked games before playing 10 or 20 normal draft games first.
I don't want to shut up in games and give it won to trolls in game and risk to get reported at sametime despite i am on the truth side.
People keep suiciding since start then complain others for the lose, or people doesn't communicate on purpose or even want to lose games on purpose which is actually a game faking!

These kind of people are more incline to ruin others people games, in many ways.
Riot policy is : i give you a penalty if you are recidive, and got many valid reports.

Imho , the system is good. Just report all these people as much as you can and don't care about some games lost. Eventually they will be banned.

With the new system, farming accounts until lv30 20 champs, is harder. Less bots, and more time/games needed in order to rank = less noobs when starting to rank. In future, the minimum amount of champs will be raised.
